alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 5:24AM EDT until March 26 at 6:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Spalding County in west central Georgia... Southern Fayette County in north central Georgia... Southwestern Henry County in north central Georgia... Southeastern Coweta County in west central Georgia... Southeastern Clayton County in north central Georgia... * Until 615 AM EDT. * At 523 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moreland, or near Newnan, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Newnan, Fayetteville, Peachtree City, Hampton, Lovejoy, Senoia, Brooks, Sharpsburg, Turin, Woolsey, Sunny Side, Towalaga, Starrs Mill, Birdie, Inman, Bonanza, Atlanta Motor Speedway, Jw Smith Reservoir, Lake Horton and Irondale. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to shelter inside a strong building, and stay away from windows. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
